title: Little Nightmares: Complete Edition + OST + Wallpapers
body:
Little Nightmares: Complete Edition + OST + Wallpapers


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Platform adventure, Side, 3D
Companies: Tarsier Studios / Bandai Namco Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI12
Original Size: 4.1 GB
Repack Size: 2.1 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc (NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Little.Nightmares.Secrets.of.The.Maw.Chapter.3-CODEX ISO release: codex-little.nightmares.secrets.of.the.maw.chapter.3.iso (4,406,411,264 bytes)
  • All DLCs included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded, bonus content (OST and Wallpapers) included as well
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 4.1 to 2.1 GB)
  • Installation takes 4-5 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 9 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in “Engine/Binaries/ThirdParty/Steamworks/Steamv132/Win64” folder to change the game language
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911

Game Description

Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears! Help Six escape The Maw – a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal. As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover. Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out!

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is NOT backwards compatible with my previos repack of the game.
